WorkItem.ClosedComment: Works on my machine. Can you post the activity log (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/vstudio/ms241272.aspx) so we can try to diagnose further? Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
IntelliSense seems to be broken if the MySQL Connector extension is also installed in Visual Studio 2012. After uninstalling the MySQL Connector IntelliSense worked...

See also: 
[http://rhnatiuk.wordpress.com/2013/03/08/typescripts-intellisense](http://rhnatiuk.wordpress.com/2013/03/08/typescripts-intellisense)

Maybe this can be repaired in the TypeScript extension?

Download MySQL Connector: 
[http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/connector/net/](http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/connector/net/)
WorkItem.Summary: VS12 extension: IntelliSense not working together with MySQL Connector extension
